com.example.firstdesign.model

Class ThemeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.firstdesign.model.ThemeHandler

  • public class ThemeHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that has to: Store information about what theme is being used. Return information about what theme is being used.

      • getInstance

        public static ThemeHandler getInstance()
        Factory Method for Singleton object.
        Returns:
        Returns the single instance of ThemeHandler that there should be. Ideally, it should initialize INSTANCE if it's not initialized, and then return it.
